input.description:
Specify the VApp reference which is to be updated.
Valid value: String

Specify the end user licenses agreements.
Valid value : String

Specify the list of transports to use for properties.
Supported values are: “iso” and “com.vmware.guestInfo”.

Specify this on a Virtual Machine object, if VM needs an initial boot before the deployment is complete else on a VApp object, then indicates than one or more VMs needs an initial reboot. This flag is automatically reset once the reboot has happened.
Valid value: Boolean

Specifies the delay in seconds to wait for the VM to power off after the initial boot (used only if installBootRequired is true). A value of 0 means wait forever
Valid value: Number

Update the description of VApp.
Valid value: String

Specifies how IP allocation should be managed by the VI platform. This is typically specified by the deployer.
Valid value: “transientpolicy”, “fixedpolicy” and “dhcppolicy”

Specifies the chosen IP protocol for this deployment.
Valid value: String which must be one of the values in the supported IP Protocol field. Like (IPv4 and IPv6).

Specify the IP allocation schemes supported by the guest software.
Valid value: “ovfenv” and “dhcp”

Specify the IP protocols supported by the guest software.
Valid value: “IPv4” and “IPv6”

Specify the Information about the product installed in virtual machine in VApp.
type : xml

Specify the list of properties of VApp. Single property should also be contained in <property-list> element.
Sample Format: <property-list> <property> <operation>add</operation--> <info> <category>TestCategory</category> <default-value>TestProperty</default-value> <type>string</type> <id>Property_2</id> <description>Adding Property</description> <key>1</key> <label>TestLabel</label> </info> </property> <property> <operation>add</operation--> <info> <category>TestCategory</category> <default-value>TestProperty</default-value> <type>string</type> <id>Property_2</id> <description>Adding Property</description> <key>1</key> <label>TestLabel</label> </info> </property> </property-list>

Specify the not interpreted OVF meta-data sections. For single <ovf-section> details please provide that as well in <ovf-section-list> item.
type: xml
Sample format: <ovf-section-list> <ovf-section> <operation>add</operation> <info> <key>1</key> <contents>Test Contents1</contents> <namespace>TestNameSpace1</namespace> <type>TestOVFSection1</type> <at-envelope-level>true</at-envelope-level> </info> <ovf-section> <ovf-section> <operation>add</operation> <info> <key>2</key> <contents>Test Contents2</contents> <namespace>TestNameSpace2</namespace> <type>TestOVFSection2</type> <at-envelope-level>true</at-envelope-level> </info> <ovf-section> </ovf-section-list>

Specify the configuration of sub-entities (virtual machine or vApp container). The entity list contains the updated configuration for one or more than one sub entities. To update the single sub entity in it is mandatory to provide that configuration inside the <entity-config-list> tag.
Sample format: <entity-config-list> <entity-config> <destroy-with-parent>true</destroy-with-parent> <key>Test_VM_In_VApp</key> <start-action>powerOn</start-action> <start-delay>15</start-delay> <start-order>0</start-order> <stop-action></stop-action> <stop-delay></stop-delay> <tag>Test</tag> </entity-config> <entity-config> <destroy-with-parent>true</destroy-with-parent> <key>Test_VM_In_VApp</key> <start-action>powerOn</start-action> <start-delay>15</start-delay> <start-order>0</start-order> <stop-action></stop-action> <stop-delay></stop-delay> <tag>Test</tag> </entity-config> </entity-config-list>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <items> <item> <parameters> <virtual-app>${virtual app}</virtual-app> <spec> ${product info}${property list} <ip-assignment> <ip-allocation-policy>${ip allocation policy}</ip-allocation-policy> <ip-protocol>${ip protocol}</ip-protocol> <supported-allocation-scheme>${supported allocation scheme}</supported-allocation-scheme> <supported-ip-protocol>${supported ip protocol}</supported-ip-protocol> </ip-assignment> <eula>${eula}</eula> ${ovf section list} <ovf-environment-transport>${ovf environment transport}</ovf-environment-transport> <install-boot-required>${install boot required}</install-boot-required> <install-boot-stop-delay>${install boot stop delay}</install-boot-stop-delay> ${entity config list} <annotation>${annotation}</annotation> </spec> </parameters> </item> </items> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
